comments:
I tried to upgrade my 3.0.1 installation with teh 3.0.2 update using the
Software Update Manager.

After experiencing some time outs for about three jars (I believe
org.org.eclipse.sdk_3.0.2 was one of them). I asked the program to retry and it
did verify many of the jars and dowloaded the missing ones.  However, at restart
I experienced that Eclipse does fail to start. For details see the attached log
file.

Kaj

The log produced after 3.0.2 update attempt

This is a known bug that has been fixed in 3.0.1.1 and 3.0.2.
Download the eclipse sdk zip file and unzip it on top of your corrupt 
installation.
Then restart eclipse with -clean
